overview: From Paris to Montreal, via Kingshasa, Eddy King has had an extraordinary experience. With his disconcerting stories and his ease in talking about disturbing subjects, this young man bewitches, surprises and disconcerts! His universe is nourished by cultural references and a good dose of derision! His favorite subjects are taboos.  Its mission leaves no doubt: to proclaim loud and clear what people think softly. Incisive, with punch, punch and more punch, Eddy King has adopted a winning formula: simple and authentic.  Show recorded on July 20, 2012 at the 5th auditorium of Place des Arts, Montreal.
title: Eddy King, Premier One-Man Show!
